content: Stock up on all medicines before heading into the fight to boost your stats, and don't hold back on your spells because the Mad Tiger certainly isn't going to hold back on you!
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Mad_Tiger_Spirit.md', within the main section titled 'Mad Tiger Spirit', specifically from the subsection 'Mad Tiger Fight'.
The content is as follows:
Stock up on all medicines before heading into the fight to boost your stats, and don't hold back on your spells because the Mad Tiger certainly isn't going to hold back on you!
